comments: The 42-digit cycle 1,0,2,0,4,0,8,1,6,3,2,6,5,3,0,6,1,2,2,4,4,8,9,7,9,5,9,1,8,3,6,7,3,4,6,9,3,8,7,7,5,5 in this sequence and the others based on forty-ninths, gives the successive digits of the smallest integer which is multiplied by 5 when the final digit is moved from the right hand end to the left hand end. - _Ian Duff_, Jan 09 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
